direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods manage attributes for tags but perform opposite operations (adding vs. removing).
Both methods involve adding attributes to tags with similar control flows and validation checks.
Both methods manage attributes for tags but perform opposite operations (adding vs. removing enforced attributes).
addAttributes relies on addTags to ensure the tag is allowed before adding attributes.
isSafeAttribute depends on the attributes added by addAttributes to determine if an attribute is safe.
getEnforcedAttributes retrieves attributes that might have been added by addAttributes or addEnforcedAttribute.
Both methods manage attributes for tags, with addProtocols focusing on URL protocols for specific attributes.
Both methods manage attributes for tags but perform opposite operations (adding vs. removing protocols).
